title: Pixel OG over heating
content:
The phone gets really hot and then freezes and crashes. When not charging I have to put on the battery saver mode just to reduce the behaviour. But it still crashes. 

It definitely crashes when the following happens 
- updating the apps. 
- Charging the phone
- removing from battery saver mode. 

Once it crashed in flight mode and when it restarted, it was set to couple of days ago.

Also it gets really hot around the power button.
